entry.title: UModeler
entry.content:
Model and Sketch your World in Unity.

UModeler provides you with the most convenient environment for low-poly 3D modeling and prototyping within Unity.


Website | Unity Discussions | Manual | Tutorial Videos | Discord | Facebook |

Release Note | Contact.Support@umodeler.com



THINGS TO KNOW


  • Watch UModeler Essentials Videos, narrated by Indie Game Hustle
  • Finalist for "Best Development Tool" at Unity Awards 2018
  • Includes the PastelTown-BuiltInRP-UModeler package as a default demo asset
  • Streamlined and reliable Prefab workflow, starting from UModeler version 2.9.18
  • Minimum Unity version required to use UModeler is 2019.4.x
  • UModeler doesn't support the runtime API and editing.


ARTICLES


  • Modeling Moonglow Village in Unity with UModeler [80.lv]
  • Level Design in Unity: Witchâ€™s Cauldron [80.lv]
  • Level Design in Unity: Blocking Out a Cyberpunk Scene with UModeler [80.lv]
  • Modeling a Mech Robot in Unity with UModeler [80.lv]
  • UModeler for Unity [80.lv]


FEATURES


1) No need for export & import processes to create your world anymore.

â€¢ Edit and manipulate 3D meshes directly within Unity, in the final environment context.

â€¢ See shader/VFX results instantly whenever you modify a base mesh.

â€¢ Modify and tweak meshes made with external DCC software (such as Blender, 3ds Max, Maya, etc.) right in Unity.


2) Sketch-Based 3D Modeling Technique

â€¢ Various drawing tools and the PushPull tool allow for intuitive 3D shape creation.

â€¢ Quickly prototype your level using this feature.


3) Comprehensive 3D Modeling Tools and UV Editor

â€¢ Quickly create 3D assets and levels with nearly 150 versatile tools.

â€¢ UModeler features adjustable 3D primitive shapes for added flexibility.

â€¢ Unwrap any mesh and edit UVs directly in Unity with the built-in UV Editor.

â€¢ New Feature: Hotspot texturing is now available!


4) High Compatibility with other Unity Assets

â€¢ ProBuilder: Smooth conversion of ProBuilder meshes.

â€¢ Polybrush: Seamlessly edit UModeler meshes with Polybrush.

â€¢ Synty Studio's 3D Assets: Convert 3D meshes into UModeler and edit them seamlessly.

â€¢ Surforge: Fully compatible with PBR texturing.

â€¢ And more


5) Extensive Learning Materials and Active Online Communities

â€¢ Narrated tutorial videos for both beginners and intermediate users.

â€¢ Comprehensive 'Timeline' and 'Full-making' videos demonstrating 3D asset modeling with UModeler.

â€¢ Engage with a vibrant community on Discord and the Unity Forum. Ask questions, share insights, or showcase your art.


6) Who Can Benefit from UModeler?

â€¢ Level Designers

â€¢ 3D Modelers

â€¢ Concept Artists

â€¢ Technical Artists (TAs)

â€¢ VFX Artists

â€¢ Programmers

â€¢ Indie Game Developers

â€¢ And more


If you want to know the lastest information, visit our blog post: https://docs.umodeler.com/blog/umodeler-x-2025-jan-news/

entry.title: Dynamic Mesh Combiner
entry.content:
A powerful tool that seamlessly combines either skinned or regular mesh renderers. It allows for both animated and static output with support for LODs* and dynamic object manipulation.

Dynamic Mesh Combiner will help optimize the performance of all your 3D models while still maintaining visual quality. Whether you're working on a mobile game, a PC game, or a VR project, Dynamic Mesh Combiner is the ultimate tool for reducing draw calls and improving performance in your Unity project.


To start combining, simply add the 'MC Mesh Combiner' component to the root game object and 'MC Combinable' or 'MC LOD Combinable' to any child renderers that you want to combine. The asset will take care of the rest automatically and will update if the objects are moved!


If you'd like to try out Dynamic Mesh Combiner to see if itâ€™s the right fit for your project, we offer a free demo version that you can try out before purchase: Demo


Works well with these outline assets:

  • Ultimate Outlines & Highlights
  • Easy Performant Outline
  • Highlight Plus - All in One Outline & Selection Effects

Feel free to consult the documentation before use or join our discord server if you have any questions!

entry.title: Stylized Medieval Fantasy Weapons Pack
entry.content:
Stylized Medieval Fantasy Weapons Pack

The Stylized Medieval Fantasy Weapons Pack contains 20 professional weapon models. The Fantasy Weapons pack includes high-quality hand-drawn weapon textures. All weapons are mobile-friendly and 100% ready-to-play in prefabs, ready for use in your game!

Features:

  • 20 Professional 3D Models
  • Texture size: 2048x2048px
  • This bundle comes with an extended commercial license, which means you can use these effects to create stunning designs for yourself and your clients!

entry.title: Low Poly Ultimate Pack
entry.content:
The Ultimate Pack for low poly graphics. Perfect for prototyping/making low-poly styled art and games.

The Ultimate Pack for low poly graphics.

Great for prototyping/making low-poly styled art and games.

There is nothing like this in the market: 8 years of work with free monthly updates.


The creation of this pack was only possible thanks to you, all of our users, and we would like to use this opportunity to thank you, promising that we will continue expanding this massive creation, making it the best thing ever :)


â€” Content â€”


  • More than 3000 unique Prefabs with colliders
  • Many great Inspiration Scenes
  • Set of generic Animations
  • Material and Atlas texture workflow
  • (Two versions of each model for speed or optimization)
  • Rigged simple people characters with Mixamo support
  • (Not the same as Low Poly Animated People)
  • Free monthly updates
  • URP support watch
  • VR/AR ready
  • Simple to use, well-organized
